configuration.comment: For XHR architecture for Java implementation

object.name: blackberry.system.event
object.comment: The System Event object allows you to access events triggered by the system.
object.example:
<script type="text/javascript">
	
	function onBatteryLevelChange(level) {         
		alert("Battery Level: " + level);
	}
	
	function notifyOnBatteryLevelChange(batteryLevelChangeCb) {
		blackberry.system.event.deviceBatteryLevelChange(batteryLevelChangeCb);
	}
	
	notifyOnBatteryLevelChange(onBatteryLevelChange);
	
	</script>

func.name: deviceBatteryLevelChange
func.comment: Assigns a listener for when the battery level changes.
func.details: Battery level is a percentage value.

param.name: onBatteryLevelChange
param.comment: Function to be called when the battery level changes. The level is passed as its only argument. Expected callback signature: function onBatteryLevelChange(level).

func.name: deviceBatteryStateChange
func.comment: Assigns a listener for when the battery state changes.

param.name: onBatteryStateChange
param.comment: Function to be called when the battery charge state changes. The new state is passed as its only argument. Expected callback signature: function onBatteryStateChange(state).
